channel.title: I need help with my server
channel.description: We will be playing it, and everything is going good! but all the sudden server jsut crashes, any ideas why this is happening?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 09, 2006, 10:16:21 AM[/size][hr]or, is there a way i can make it save there stats every little bit? like every 20minutes it saves stats or something?
